item.title: 意大利 Cucinelli 公司第一季度销售额增长 10.5%
item.description: 意大利奢侈时装集团布鲁内罗-库奇内利（Brunello Cucinelli）周三表示，受零售和批发渠道稳健表现的推动，按固定汇率计算，第一季度销售额增长了 10.5%。【原文：Italian luxury fashion group Brunello Cucinelli on Wednesday said sales had risen 10.5% at constant exchange rates in the first quarter, boosted by a solid performance in retail and wholesale channels.】

item.title: 世界银行班加称不确定美国对国际开发协会的捐款，特朗普对话具有建设性
item.description: 世界银行行长阿贾伊-班加（Ajay Banga）周三表示，他与特朗普政府就发展贷款机构进行了建设性的讨论，但他补充说，他不知道美国将为该银行面向世界最贫穷国家的基金提供多少捐款。【原文：World Bank President Ajay Banga said on Wednesday that he has had constructive discussions with the Trump administration about the development lender but added that he does not know how much the U.S. will contribute to the bank's fund for the world's poorest countries.】

item.title: 惠誉认为大流行病之外的世界经济增长为 2009 年以来最弱
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）周三下调了全球经济增长预期，预计随着全球贸易紧张局势的升级，除 COVID-19 大流行之外，全球经济将出现 2009 年以来最弱的扩张。【原文：Fitch Ratings cut its global growth forecasts on Wednesday, projecting the weakest expansion since 2009 save for the COVID-19 pandemic as global trade tensions escalate.】

item.title: TikTok 开始在美国测试与 X 的 "社区笔记 "类似的 "脚注
item.description: TikTok 周三开始在美国测试 "脚注 "功能，该功能类似于 X 和 Meta 使用的 "社区笔记"，因为该短视频平台正在等待达成一项协议，以确保其在美国的存在。【原文：TikTok on Wednesday started testing "Footnotes" in the United States, a feature similar to "Community Notes" used by X and Meta , as the short-video platform awaits a deal that will secure its presence in the country.】

item.title: 欧盟搁置制裁俄罗斯液化天然气进口的想法
item.description: 欧盟官员表示，由于一些国家政府的抵制以及替代来源的不确定性，欧洲官员放弃了在即将推出的一揽子计划中推动禁止该集团进口俄罗斯液化天然气的想法。【原文：European officials have dropped the idea of pushing for a ban on the bloc's Russian liquefied natural gas imports in upcoming packages because of resistance from some governments and uncertainty about alternative sources, EU officials said.】

item.title: 法国水下无人机制造商 Exail 订单量激增 500% 以上
item.description: 法国高科技工业集团 Exail Technologies 周三公布，受欧洲各国政府国防开支增加的推动，该公司今年第一季度的订单量增长了 519%。【原文：French high-tech industrial group Exail Technologies on Wednesday reported a 519% rise in its order intake in the first quarter of the year, driven by higher defence spending by European governments.】

item.title: 元审判：扎克伯格证词的 5 个关键时刻
item.description: Meta Platforms 首席执行官马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）本周在华盛顿的一场高风险庭审中作证，美国联邦贸易委员会（Federal Trade Commission）正试图解除 Meta 对重要资产 Instagram 和 WhatsApp 的收购。【原文：Meta Platforms CEO Mark Zuckerberg testified this week at a high-stakes trial in Washington where the U.S. Federal Trade Commission is seeking to unwind Meta's acquisitions of prized assets Instagram and WhatsApp.】

item.title: 英国 Ocado 首席执行官斯坦纳暂时掌管技术部门
item.description: 英国网上超市和技术公司 Ocado 周三表示，首席执行官蒂姆-斯坦纳（Tim Steiner）将暂时领导 Ocado 解决方案公司，该公司的子部门专注于为零售商提供全方位的技术平台。【原文：British online supermarket and technology firm Ocado said on Wednesday that CEO Tim Steiner will temporarily lead Ocado Solutions, the company's sub-unit which focuses on an all-encompassing technology platform for retailers.】

item.title: 人工智能生成的音乐占上传到 Deezer 的所有曲目的 18
item.description: 法国流媒体平台 Deezer 周三表示，上传到 Deezer 的歌曲中约有 18% 完全由人工智能生成，这表明在版权风险和对艺术家公平报酬的担忧下，人工智能技术的应用日益广泛。【原文：About 18% of songs uploaded to Deezer are fully generated by AI, the French streaming platform said on Wednesday, underscoring the technology's growing use amid copyright risks and concerns about fair payouts to artists.】

item.title: DIW 称，使用人工智能提高了预测欧洲央行行动的准确性
item.description: 德国柏林经济研究所（DIW Berlin）周三的一项研究称，人工智能的使用将提高预测欧洲中央银行货币政策动向的准确性。【原文：The use of artificial intelligence will increase accuracy when predicting the monetary policy moves of the European Central Bank, a study by the German Institute for Economic Research DIW Berlin said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 行业数据显示，特斯拉第一季度在加州的注册量下降了 15
item.description: 行业数据显示，特斯拉第一季度在加州的电动汽车注册量下降了 15.1%，这表明埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）领导的汽车制造商在美国这一重要市场面临的挑战日益严峻。【原文：Tesla's electric vehicle registrations in California dropped 15.1% during the first quarter, according to industry data, signaling growing challenges for the Elon Musk-led automaker in the crucial U.S. market.】

item.title: 美国原油库存增加，汽油和馏分油库存下降 - EIA
item.description: 美国能源信息署周三称，上周美国原油库存上升，而汽油和馏分油库存下降。【原文：U.S. crude stocks rose while gasoline and distillate inventories fell last week, the Energy Information Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国 2 月份商业库存温和增长
item.description: 在销售强劲增长的情况下，2 月份美国企业库存略有增加，这可能是因为家庭在进口关税之前囤积了货物。【原文：U.S. business inventories increased slightly in February amid strong sales growth likely as households stocked up on goods ahead of tariffs on imports.】

item.title: 黄金魅力不减，价格突破3300美元/盎司，创下历史新高
item.description: 金价突破每盎司 3,300 美元大关，创下历史新高，因为投资者在寻求避开围绕中美贸易紧张局势的动荡。【原文：Gold prices pierced the $3,300 an ounce barrier to hit record highs as investors sought a refuge from the turbulence surrounding trade tensions between the United States and China.】

item.title: 福特中国业务去年盈利 9 亿美元
item.description: 福特汽车公司的一位高层管理人员周三表示，该公司在中国的业务（包括出口）去年实现了 9 亿美元的息税前利润。【原文：Ford Motor's China business, including exports from the country, made $900 million in earnings before interest and taxes last year, one of the automaker's top executives said Wednesday.】

item.title: VIEW 加拿大银行将基准利率维持在 2.75% 不变
item.description: 加拿大央行周三将基准利率维持在 2.75%，这是连续七次降息后的首次暂停。【原文：The Bank of Canada on Wednesday held its benchmark interest rate at 2.75%, its first pause after seven consecutive cuts.】

item.title: Downdetector 显示，全球数以千计的用户无法使用 Spotify
item.description: 据 Downdetector.com 网站报道，本周三，全球数以千计的用户无法使用音乐流媒体平台 Spotify 的服务。【原文：Music streaming platform Spotify's services were down for thousands of users worldwide on Wednesday, according to Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 美国对华芯片出口新限制令 AMD 蒙受 8 亿美元损失
item.description: 先进微器件公司（Advanced Micro Devices）周三表示，由于特朗普政府最近限制向中国出口先进处理器，该公司预计将产生高达 8 亿美元的费用。【原文：Advanced Micro Devices expects charges of up to $800 million due to the latest curbs by the Trump administration on exports of advanced processors to China, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国 3 月制造业产出放缓，关税阴云笼罩工厂
item.description: 由于唐纳德-特朗普总统征收全球关税，引发了与中国的贸易战，3月份美国制造业生产温和增长，并可能进一步减速。【原文：U.S. manufacturing production rose moderately in March and could decelerate further amid President Donald Trump's global tariffs, which have sparked a trade war with China.】

item.title: 阿根廷的外汇赌博初战告捷。现在是艰难的部分
item.description: 阿根廷自由派总统哈维尔-米莱伊本周掷骰子决定进行一次重大的经济调整，取消了实施近六年的货币管制，以保护比索，避免美元外流。【原文：Argentina's libertarian President Javier Milei rolled the dice this week on a major economic swerve, tearing down currency controls that had been in place for almost six years to protect the peso and avert an outflow of dollars.】

item.title: 加密货币公司 DWF Labs 购买了 2500 万美元的特朗普世界自由金融代币
item.description: 总部位于阿布扎比的加密货币投资者和交易公司 DWF Labs 周三表示，它已购买了由美国总统唐纳德-特朗普家族控制的加密货币企业 World Liberty Financial 发行的价值 2500 万美元的数字代币。【原文：DWF Labs, an Abu Dhabi-based crypto investor and trading firm, said on Wednesday it had bought $25 million worth of digital tokens issued by the World Liberty Financial, the crypto venture controlled by the family of U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 加拿大央行称美国关税可能引发深度衰退
item.description: 路透社渥太华4月16日电）根据加拿大央行周三发布的一项预测，如果美国关税引发全球贸易战，加拿大的通胀率将飙升，并将陷入深度衰退。【原文：OTTAWA, April 16 (Reuters) - If U.S. tariffs trigger a global trade war, inflation in Canada would spike and the country would enter a deep recession, according to a Bank of Canada scenario released on Wednesday.】

item.description: 路透社渥太华4月16日电）加拿大央行行长蒂夫-马克莱姆（Tiff Macklem）周三发表声明如下：【原文：OTTAWA, April 16 (Reuters) - The Bank of Canada released the following statement by Governor Tiff Macklem on Wednesday:】

item.title: 中国视频应用豆瓣推出帮助外贸企业转向国内市场的项目
item.description: 在中美贸易战不断升级之际，热门短视频平台豆瓣网（TikTok在中国的姊妹应用）周三推出了一项计划，帮助中国出口商在国内销售商品。【原文：Popular short video platform Douyin, TikTok's sister app in China, launched on Wednesday a program to help Chinese exporters sell their goods domestically, amid an escalating U.S.-China trade war.】

item.title: Progressive 季度利润因强劲的汽车保险需求而大幅增长
item.description: 保险商 Progressive 周三公布的第一季度利润增长了 10%，这主要得益于汽车保单需求的恢复性增长。【原文：Insurer Progressive reported a 10% jump in first-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by resilient demand for its auto insurance policies.】

item.title: 世界贸易组织下调 2025 年贸易增长预测，警告将出现更严重的衰退
item.description: 世界贸易组织周三大幅下调了对全球商品贸易的预测，从稳健增长转为下降，称美国进一步征收关税和外溢效应可能导致全球商品贸易出现自 COVID 大流行以来最严重的下滑。【原文：The World Trade Organization sharply cut its forecast for global merchandise trade from solid growth to a decline on Wednesday, saying further U.S. tariffs and spillover effects could lead to the heaviest slump since the height of the COVID pandemic.】

item.title: 美国机构在最后一刻反悔，延长对网络漏洞数据库的支持
item.description: 美国官员发言人周三表示，将把对网络弱点数据库的支持延长 11 个月，该数据库在打击漏洞和黑客攻击方面发挥着至关重要的作用--就在资金即将用完之时。【原文：U.S. officials will extend support for 11 months for a database of cyber weaknesses that plays a critical role in fighting bugs and hacks, a spokesperson said on Wednesday - just as the funding was due to run out.】

item.title: Lyft 投资方 Engine Capital 将在代理权争夺战中提名董事会成员
item.description: 激进投资者 Engine Capital 正在为 Lyft 的代理权争夺战做准备，准备提名两名董事进入这家叫车公司的董事会。【原文：Activist investor Engine Capital is gearing up for a proxy battle at Lyft , as it prepares to nominate two directors to the board of the ride-hailing company.】
